We have renamed our DMT5 accounts

Hi client’s name,

As part of our continued effort to improve client experience, we have renamed our DMT5 accounts:

As part of our continued effort to improve client experience, we have renamed our DMT5 accounts:

  • DMT5 Synthetic Indices has changed to DMT5 Synthetic
  • DMT5 Standard has changed to DMT5 Financial
  • DMT5 Advanced has changed to DMT5 Financial STP

We’re hoping that this change will make choosing the right DMT5 account easier for you.

What you can trade within these accounts remain the same. Here’s a little recap:

DMT5 Synthetic

Contracts for differences (CFDs)

DMT5 Financial

Commodities, cryptocurrencies, and currency pairs with high leverage

DMT5 Financial STP

Major, minor, and exotic currency pairs with tight spreads and higher volumes

If you have any questions, please contact us.

Happy trading!
Team Deriv
